name: Rise: Race The Future
summary: Experience the most addictive racing gameplay! Drift and slide like never before thanks to an exceptional fluid and precise physics-based slippery handling. Unique futuristic cars, smooth powerslides, jumps and water zones take old-school rally arcade games to the next level of fun!
info:
• 中文名: 崛起·冲向未来
  • 游戏类型: 竞速
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2018年11月1日
  • 售价: 54CNY
  • 官方网站: http://www.vd-dev.com/
